Subbed Projects.Show Name: Hunter x Hunter Movie 1: Phantom Rouge

Good Comments: Okay editing, but I noticed lots of double spacers in the script, words without spaces that needed them and some bad phrasing; however, it's the only group with a timely release and you won't find it anywhere better.
A next to flawless translation, superb editing, very fitting typesetting, gorgeous encoding in both 1080 and 720p. A masterful release by S-A.
Bad Comments: Just perfect in all possible ways.. Epic experience, THANKS! :D
They did a good job, the subs were simple and easy to follow.
